website_summaries.verdict: A beer pong table with all the bells and whistles that create an atmosphere of pure entertainment.
pros: Built with lights that last up to 12 hours, even in environments with poor lighting (i.e
the great outdoors) and provides much appreciated extras such as towels
Packs neatly into the size of a briefcase
A favorite of loyal beer pong table aficionados
cons: The directions may be difficult for some at first, but do lay out all the steps

customer_reviews.title: Huge hit!
customer_reviews.text: Huge hit at our graduation party. Everyone wanted to know where we got this. The leg heights are adjustable and the cup holes make it way less messy than a normal table top. My college age nieces and nephews loved it and were very impressed :) Even the young kids were playing, but with water. Safe to say my kids will be pros by the time the head to college! :)
customer_reviews.author: jth

customer_reviews.title: No spills!
customer_reviews.text: This is really great and does exactly what you need it to - no spills. The only downside is that the rigidity of the cups in the table makes it hard to make it in the cups - the balls bounce out a lot. Still, when you’re renting or don’t have a space where it’s safe to make a mess and/or can’t play outside, the sunken cups are worth the extra long pong games. We had lots of fun drawing all over the white board. I would buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well received
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this table for my son and his friends who like to play beer pong. They are all in their 20's. I picked this one because of the surface - the dry erase surface. Out of the box and set up as fast as possible, the drawings went on first, then they played for about an hour. All participants declared the table a success! Creativity does not disappear after childhood. It remains, and this is a way for people to express themselves, wipe it clean, and start over again. This is more than a party pong table.
customer_reviews.author: Mollie Millions

customer_reviews.title: Great product with GREAT customer service
customer_reviews.text: I havent been able to PLAY on the table yet, but pulling it out and doing a once over, I'm more than satisfied with it! Sharp, bright colors, easily accessible and good quality. But what really stood out what the note the owner sent with my table♡ it is always appreciated when a seller adds that extra care.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: The quality of materials, workmanship and functionality of this table was above and beyond expectations! It opens and closes easily and with little exertion. You need 2 people to set it upright due to the length, but that’s not a big deal. Once set up on a level surface it is sturdy and not flimsy whatsoever. Lightweight but not tippy. Easy to fold up and store back in the box! Kudos to the designer and manufacturer! *I would recommend adding another foam “pool noodle” ball holder under the other end of the table instead of just at one end. Overall I was very pleased with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Marie

customer_reviews.title: Worth getting for your next party
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with this product. It's 2'x2' when folded up and there's a handle like a brief case. This is easy to assemble and dismantle to store. If you happen to use this indoors though and dismantle laying on just hardwood floors on the table's side then be careful as it might scratch your floors if you aren't careful. The table was nice and colorful as well too. It makes a great house warming/party gift.
customer_reviews.author: Tnew

customer_reviews.title: Great party addition...
customer_reviews.text: Really fun and love that it's portable and easy to store. The cup holders are awesome for keeping accidents from happening; we can play indoors without worry of the drink spilling on the ground. Couple downsides: Material is really flimsy; I feel like I'm going to break it when closing and opening sometimes. With the cup holders, your re-racking options are minimal and very limited. Also, wish they had an extra cup hole for a water cup. Other than that, it makes a great addition to any party or event!
customer_reviews.author: TBV

customer_reviews.title: It's decent
customer_reviews.text: This table is nice and extremely portable. Since this probably was designed to be super light weight and portable you need to be careful not to twist it as all the metal bits are thin. As long as you carefully dissemble/assemble it you should have no issues. Also in order to make a bounce shot you really need to bounce the balls hard as the panels are coated masonite . One part that they could improve is to have the four sections lock so when you are setting it upright from unfolding the don't flop around.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Miller

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: It works if you know how to use it, but can run into the risk of breaking or bending the hinges that are cheap and lack sturdiness. Guess we’re okay with the tables since it official in length and size. Try keeping the tables inside and dry for longevity and rust. I am not sure if would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey T Ling

customer_reviews.title: I love my beer pong table
customer_reviews.text: I love my beer pong table! The dry erase/ LED lights make it all the more fun to use!! we are able to draw brackets for tournaments and write whatever else we want to write on the table itself and it comes off no problem! The LED lights change speed and color by the push of a button! The table itself folds up quick and easy and is carried by its handles! It comes with balls and dry erase markers so no need for other purchases! I love my beer pong table!!
customer_reviews.author: Julianne

customer_reviews.title: Water damage after 1st use
customer_reviews.text: I have used this table ONE time for beer bong/flip cup. The instructions say to not let it stay wet and we didn’t. However it still has water damage on the 2 ends of the table and is all bumpy now and cannot be used for the intended purposes anymore. This is an expensive table intended for a game that spills beer or water potentially it shouldn’t develop water damage after one day of use. I am NOT happy at all about this product.
customer_reviews.author: P.M.

customer_reviews.title: Great party item
customer_reviews.text: Table arrived in great condition, and was exactly what we were looking for. The only comment I have is that it was a bit hard to find the controls and we could not find instructions on how the LED switch order was. We found out through trial and error. It was such a big success that some people wanted to get one for themselves!!
customer_reviews.author: Steven G.Top Contributor: Lego

customer_reviews.title: Awesome table
customer_reviews.text: Love this table! I love playing beer pong and the ordinary plastic tables that people usually have are too small. This table is a great size, it’s nice having the pong ball holder too. It’s a bit difficult to fold down on your own, but not impossible. It’s light enough so that it’s not too much trouble. Great table for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Mir

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my birthday (and future parties we hold), I had bought some LED lights to tape onto the bottom of the table to make it more flashy, and it came out great! It is sturdy, long, and not to wobbly. I recommend for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Kate Christensen

customer_reviews.title: It's held up
customer_reviews.text: So far after having this table for a year, I'm impressed it's held up so well! Its been camping, pool party, house party, and beyond and the table is still holding up with minimum wear. I have the older model which has el wire instead of the LEDs which I am now in the process of adding to my current table. Bang for buck I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Klopfenstein

customer_reviews.title: Great Dry Erase table!
customer_reviews.text: Dry Erase beer bong table is better then I expected! It wasn’t as expensive as other table but great quality. Packaging was perfect no dents or scratches I was worried in what shape it would arrive in. This table is already a hit with friends and family!
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Better than Bpong
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this table to anyone. I've played with the official B Pong table and this table is every bit as nice at a much better price. I purchased the flat table with lights at the same price as the B Pong brand with no lights. The lights are a very unobtrusive strip set into the outer edge of the table. It's actually much nicer than what is pictured. They also have 3 modes that can be set differently on each side- solid, slow flash, fast flash. 4 AA batteries are required for use.
customer_reviews.author: MtrWrkz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: It has a ping pong ball holder on one side which I didn't expect so that was nice, it opens just fine but sometimes when I close it I feel like im breaking it but Im sure thats just the hinges. I love the dry erase but it isn't exactly dry erase you can write on it with expo markers and it comes off mostly but you need water at the least to get it off. Overall I do enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Tkay94

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: The table is very cool, I love the lights and the cut-out holes make it easy to avoid spilling the water all over the place. I absolutely love that it can fold up into a carrying-size table, making it easy to put away in our apartment. It is exactly to the measurements and fits in our hallway perfectly. I can't wait to use it at our parties, it'll be so much fun!
customer_reviews.author: anonymoose

customer_reviews.title: Nice design and well lit.
customer_reviews.text: Great table!. Had a lot of fun at my house warming party with this. sturdy design, good height and the lights are more than bright enough. Kind of need 2 people to set it up only because the separate folding panels don't lock, so when you unfold it and then go to lift the table up and flip it the panels will try to fold back in. Only recommendation would be to have the folding panels lock somehow and let people control the lights with an app.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, well built, LOTS OF FUN!!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very quickly and well packaged. Table is a lot of fun. We've only had it for a week or two now, but it's been put up and taken down multiple times and appears to be well built. It would be nice if you could lock the lights onto a single color combination, they flash all the time. Only other thing they could improve on is if there was a lid to put on the holes when the cups are removed... but then again, that may take away from the challenge some. OVERALL a very good purchase. We bought a second as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & travel friendly
customer_reviews.text: First timer (although you wouldn't know it by my performance... beginners luck I guess). Experienced players loved the table. The only complaint was not being able to configure the cups in different formats, although I LOVED the security of the cups... less spills/mess. The designer thought of everything... has a ball storage area underneath & a towel hanging from the end. I bought the one w lights which was also a hit! I also received a personal handwritten note from the seller, thanking me for my purchase & hoped I enjoyed the table (nice touch).
customer_reviews.author: Pberry

customer_reviews.title: The lights are a cool novelty, for sure
customer_reviews.text: Finally got around to trying this out. The lights are a cool novelty, for sure, and the cup cutouts are nice. The table, as others noted, didn't stand as high as we would've liked. Maybe if we had foregone the cutouts (and therefore had the cups sitting higher) it wouldn't have been as noticeable... but it is an even playing field regardless. I am not going to dock any stars for the height, but would be nicer if it had a higher setting.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: I do not at all mean that in a bad way either
customer_reviews.text: I just received my table and it is exactly as advertised. I do not at all mean that in a bad way either! I am thrilled and am currently taking advantage of the table right now! The decals are smooth and the bounce on the table is ideal. So often with 'portable' products do you find that they are still outrageously heavy despite being compact, but that is not at all the case with this table. It maintains a lightweight build without losing any of its' durability. The only notable con I have found so far is that it is a little short for my tastes, but that is not at all the end of the world.
customer_reviews.author: N.G.

customer_reviews.title: Very Cheap
customer_reviews.text: For 100+$ this has got to be the most cheap table I have ever bought. After 2 times of use the wood under the laminate is warping and the cheaply made metal is also starting to breakdown making it harder and harder to fold. The cup holders put the cups so low that they only stick like an inch out of the table.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Stop looking and buy this table!
customer_reviews.text: Man this table is Incredible!!! It’s so well put together. We used it last night and it was a hit!! My only regret on this is I didnt get the one with the lights!!! So if you’re reading this and thinking “hmmmm idk if I should get this one” stop thinking that and buy it because it’s worth but make sure you get the one with the lights lol.
customer_reviews.author: Sonny Medina

customer_reviews.title: This table is great! I was going to buy a glow pong ...
customer_reviews.text: This table is great! I was going to buy a glow pong table until I read the reviews here and on Spencer's site. That is where we were going to purchase a table. Yes, it is lower to the ground. People can sit on chairs if they want to. We are discussing getting some PVC pipe to fashion longer legs and base for when you want to stand up to play. No more beer pong played on the pool table! I hated that. This can go from the basement to the garage. Love the holes for the cups, not more spills! Looks nice and he loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Jodie Burelison

customer_reviews.title: Hells yea
customer_reviews.text: First thing i wanna say is wow. Folded box open and saw a personal letter from the maker thanking me for my purchase. Then i opened it to find it opens 4 times its size and came with 6 balls. If that man would of tossed in the beer and cups prob would of had to buy him dinner. Definalty worth the price. Table doesnt support bouncing as well as expected but otherwise im in love wud it
customer_reviews.author: Anthony G.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in quality
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan of this table. Its sort of chincy. The lights are not that bright. The lights hummed when we first got It and when you turned it off they still flickered you had to remove the batteries all together. They sent us a new piece to install ourselves. Still didnt like it. You have to be sure that you constantly wipe it down while playing so the water doesn't damage it. Wouldn't recommend. For the price I was expecting more.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle1

customer_reviews.title: So excited for this!
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my husband as an early Christmas present. He loves it! I ordered the one with holes for the cups and they fit perfectly. Table folds up nicely and is easy to carry anywhere. Only have this 4 starts because it doesn't seem as sturdy as I had hoped. Still really great quality though.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: The table worked great and is exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Adam at party pong tables offered exemplary customer service. I ordered the table online on Wednesday, and Amazon told me it wouldn't arrive until Monday. I called Adam at Party Pong Tables and he assured me it would arrive Friday (I wanted it for the weekend). Sure enough, FedEx Ground delivered it as scheduled on Friday and all was exactly as described. The table worked great and is exactly as described. It should last a long time as long as you take care of it and don't abuse it like a drunk college fool. Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: A C

customer_reviews.title: Great tables, great value.
customer_reviews.text: Was very impressed with this table. We order four for a pong tournament we were hosting. The tables came quick, were packaged well and were sturdy and manufactured well. Very happy with this purchase and think it was a very good bang for the buck. Highly recommend these tables.
customer_reviews.author: Nate R.

customer_reviews.title: Worth getting.
customer_reviews.text: Great table. Good height. Folds and extends. Lights up and holds the cups as described. I like how the hinges kind of lock into place. Definitely worth getting. Halloween party will be LIT.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Sichanthavong

customer_reviews.title: Great table!
customer_reviews.text: Really good table. The holes are great just have to get used to not racking your cups in a straight line and still touch but other wise the table is beautifully done and everything is symetrical and works wonderfully! Oh the LED lights are spectacular. And the table came with balls too which surprised us! Super awesome and super excited to use my table during parties. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: breeanna

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Freaking awesome! Husband bought this as we love the game to share with our family and we really love it! The lights are super cool, everyone were talking about it! Great quality! Highly recommended! Shipped fast and communication with seller was great.
customer_reviews.author: Carlota

customer_reviews.title: If you want a pong table, get this one
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my boyfriend for Christmas. He was SOO HAPPY. If your thinking about getting a pong table get this one. The all white board one is perfect for multipurpose games like flip cup. You can keep score and who has next. The organizing opportunities are endless, plus friends can get creative and doodle. I prefer ones without the cup holes for re-wracking purposes but the cups do help to prevent spills.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Great table but falls apart after continuous use
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for over a year now. It's a great product and has gotten a large amount of use. It didn't take long for the LED lights to go out from spilt beer. Even without the lights it looks great. My only complaint is the Bluetooth speaker is very awkward to charge with the charger that comes with the table. The speaker also was not installed very well and actually fell off the table after a few months of use. I still use the table even with no LED lights and a hole in the middle of the table from where the speaker used to be.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Cool table but very fragile
customer_reviews.text: Fragile! I use this in the bar and it’s a cool table. But it broke twice the screws broke off and I had to tie wrap the hinges.
customer_reviews.author: Delaney M

customer_reviews.title: Hey you’re product is so cool and I especially like how it came already assembled
customer_reviews.text: Hey you’re product is so cool and I especially like how it came already assembled! My friends and i have already used it and they think it’s hype!! Keep it up! I really like the lights and the ability to change its glow color and mode! I also like how it packaged with markers and balls! Only thing I would wish dif about it is the height (would be nice to have the option of taller) and also it’s stability which also plays into height tho but it’s a little shakey at times but other than that it’s really cool and I would def suggest one of these to my friends or anyone!! Thanks sm!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS TODAY
customer_reviews.text: This product was awesome! Bought for my cousin as a high school graduation gift that he could take with him to college. He LOVED IT!! It was nicely put together and really awesome how it folds up so that you can take it with you to any party or event! It is very nicely built! My only concern is how sturdy it is but only time will tell!! Will buy this again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Abadie

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: This table is freaking awesome! Definitely would buy again if i need another one! I got it about june and just set it up for a party and definitely satisfied with it! Easy set up and it's actually not heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Paige H

customer_reviews.title: This beer pong table is not water resistant corners of ...
customer_reviews.text: This beer pong table is not water resistant corners of the tables are damage with water. This was after 1 night of playing.
customer_reviews.author: John R.

customer_reviews.title: Nice table but table is thin and not as durable ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice table but table is thin and not as durable as I thought it would be for the cost. This was my third time buying it. 1st order was damaged on arrival and second table barely leaned on it trying to get a ball and it cracked from the bottom. So 3rd table is just for show because to scared to get to into the game for the knowing of how thin it is. It looks nice though
customer_reviews.author: Latange Watson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This table is awesome, I wish I had one in college. I got it for my brother and it will be perfect to set up in his apartment when he has people over or to take tailgating! I can't wait to give it to him! Constructed well, and lightweight to carry around. Folds up nicely. Great gift for college kids!
customer_reviews.author: af_marie

customer_reviews.title: Nothing but net!
customer_reviews.text: My in-laws got this for themselves as sort of an early holiday gift. They seem to really enjoy it and I have heard them say nothing but good things about all of the features. I will get to see it firsthand when I go visit.
customer_reviews.author: Christina B.

customer_reviews.title: This table is amazing. Even came with balls
customer_reviews.text: This table is amazing. Even came with balls, a towel, and a personalized thank you letter. The lights have three functions:steady, slow blink, and fast blink. Read the instructions because the legs do extend and make the table the same height as most tables. Also, this comes with dry erase markers.
customer_reviews.author: Adam L.

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to set up and take down and it carries like a briefcase. It could be sturdier but I assume it’s built that way to keep it light. I’m happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Fun out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my son in college, and he set it up right away. By Christmas night it was in the garage with 10 kids playing all night. I wouldn't add the lights to it if I was to order again, they don't add much. It is perfect for portable parties. Stands lower than I expected, maybe only three feet high, but it folds up and carries well. Nice to be able to write on it and wipe off. Good value!
customer_reviews.author: Robert D

customer_reviews.title: The table is sturdy and it is easily folded for storage
customer_reviews.text: I wrote a review on the service and shipping from this seller and it was totally positive. My grandchildren have since used the beer pong table and it has proven to be just as described. The table is sturdy and it is easily folded for storage. The cup holes are a wonderful feature because it prevents spills. It also has a holder for the balls.
customer_reviews.author: Alswife

customer_reviews.title: Easy, Quick and lightweight setup!! PERFECT!!
customer_reviews.text: Table is exactly as pictured, opens and closes extremely easily and folds up to a perfect storable size! Light weight enough for almost anyone to carry alone, I am a small female with absolutely no muscle tone but I find it light enough to pickup and move by myself which is really awesome. The legs adjust to different heights and the length is perfect for my apartment. I definitely recommend this to anyone who loves water/beer pong.
customer_reviews.author: Jme

customer_reviews.title: Awesome table
customer_reviews.text: We love the table! Hours of fun have been had! I love how convenient it is to fold it up and stuff it in the garage and pull it out when friends are over! Thank you for all your help getting us the table by father’s day! Great customer service!!!
customer_reviews.author: Velon

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, but may not be Beer Pong tough!
customer_reviews.text: Nice light and compact and easy to take with. Not sure how long it will hold up to beer pong but time will tell. Really disappointed with the ball holder underneath the table. It is just a piece of styrofoam that doesn't hold the balls well. If a piece of plastic was too expensive to design into the table, makes you wonder where else they got cheap!
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Great product and easy to fold down
customer_reviews.text: Use this all the time. Great product and easy to fold down. The table is made of a composite so the bounces on the table are much softer than a normal table that is wood. Also, must clean off water when done to prevent sticker peeling.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for our family, and was a lot of fun playing on it over the holidays. The dry erase was great for personal messages or score keeping, and the lights are just an added bonus for playing with the lights off. Not that there is anything wrong with having the cup holes, we just feel we would have liked it better without the cup holes. Overall we really like it!!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Hildebrandt

customer_reviews.title: Don't let the features fool you
customer_reviews.text: This table is garbage. I only put 5 stars to get more exposure and offer a counter to whatever bias one may have due to the features this table offers; they're not worth it! It's short, like kid sized. It's flimsy, the dry erase leaves traces, the holes limit play, and the LEDs are disappointing. Save your money for something taller that will be more fun for a longer time. I returned this and purchased the GoPong Pro 36" tall table. Haven't christened it yet, but I have high hopes
customer_reviews.author: Steve Matakonis

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and feels good. The only issue I have is the material of the table isn’t the best for bounce shots.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: More Fun With Less Mess
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the light up pong table with cup holes in it for our New Year's Eve party. We had a blast! The cup holes keep the cups from being knocked over - I love good "clean" fun. The lights were a nice touch especially once we were a few games in and turned out the kitchen lights. Like playing beer pong at the disco.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun product.  Company good to work with.
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my hubby's birthday, and he loves it. At first one half of the lights weren't working, but the company quickly sent out a replacement part and now it works great. Happy with the customer service from the company. Product is a fun addition to our camping trips.
customer_reviews.author: ARF

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Used a few times and the hinges bent and table is bent. Not sturdy at all
customer_reviews.author: Stormy

customer_reviews.title: Super nice and easy to set up!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this table!!!! Had a blast at the grad party!!! Seamless ordering all the way to the delivery. Thank you!!!! 🍺
customer_reviews.author: Nancy De Los Santos

customer_reviews.title: It definitely is a bit flimsy so you need to make sure you're concious of the weight capacity but it's easy to fold up and doesn't take up much space ...
customer_reviews.text: Our customized table made it in less than 3 days which was a very pleasant surprise! It definitely is a bit flimsy so you need to make sure you're concious of the weight capacity but it's easy to fold up and doesn't take up much space when it's not in use. Definitely a great and affordable portable beer pong table! Would be a perfect graduation gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great table! it would be cool if it came ...
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money! Great table! it would be cool if it came with batteries, other than that i love it!
customer_reviews.author: Paul C.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent birthday gift!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for my husband and im so glad i got it! He looooved iiit Excellent quality and great personalized service from the seller! Its super portable and much bigger than i expected!! Excellent quality! The lights r also great and add that arcade feel to it! Thank u party pong!
customer_reviews.author: AE-1987

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure it will be awesome!
customer_reviews.text: this was purchased as a gift. I'm sure it will be awesome!
customer_reviews.author: One Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, sellers where friendly
customer_reviews.text: First one was broke but the company refunded the money and I bought another one.. love it. Works great
customer_reviews.author: Mady

customer_reviews.title: I like the cup holes cut outs in the table
customer_reviews.text: I like the cup holes cut outs in the table, you don't need fluids in he cups to hold them down just drink each time one is in also we use it in our rec. room and no worries about spills I would skip the lights as they do very little just a thin blue line around the perimeter of the table not enough like to make it worth it The table is a light weight table so it is not really strong if u are not going to be moving it from house to house i would get a heavier made one
customer_reviews.author: Gary Keroack

customer_reviews.title: The table is great, but seems a little short
customer_reviews.text: The table is great, but seems a little short. we ended up propping it up on wood so that we can play. The table came fast and was perfect for my birthday party. However, the middle seemed to have gotten damaged in shipping or packaging. Somehow it was a little bent. Otherwise this is a really nice table to play with :) Definitely worked with flip cup too
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for the price. good quality table with decent legs. the LED strips are standard but function well with lots of options for color and flashing. Graphics are good on the table face. Glad i got this one in the sea of drinking game tables.
customer_reviews.author: Brett G.

customer_reviews.title: Everyone wins with this table!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this table for a good friend of mine. I've only spent about 7hrs with this table so my review is based on that short time. The table seems solid and sturdy enough for stable beer pong games. A high quality product that seems to be designed by people who enjoy beer pong. I'll update this review in the future to comment on how it holds up over time and spills and bumps from people who have trouble balancing, but I hope it lasts as long as it looks and feels like it should.
customer_reviews.author: Toure'

customer_reviews.title: folds up nice and serves the purpose
customer_reviews.text: I got the basic one and it is light, folds up nice and serves the purpose. I don't play beer pong but I bought this for a party and lots of people used it and nobody complained.
customer_reviews.author: Lara

customer_reviews.title: College student's "favorite Christmas gift"
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 of these for Christmas gifts for college students that have seemingly everything. They loved it!!!! We bought through ones with the lights in it and they work great and illuminated the table perfectly. Not quite sure how we will top this next year :)
customer_reviews.author: HEATHER STANLEY

customer_reviews.title: ... to say that for the price the table is amazing, but the one thing I do not like ...
customer_reviews.text: I have to say that for the price the table is amazing, but the one thing I do not like is the fact that it is fairly difficult to set up and disassemble for storage. The only other downside is bouncing the ball is almost impossible unless you are chucking the ball at the table. The balls that were provided are not the best, but definitely not the worst that I have ever used. I would buy from this company again!
customer_reviews.author: ST1Ghost

customer_reviews.title: My kids like the table
customer_reviews.text: My kids like the table. I just didn't read the fine print. I thought this came with the LED lights. I was reading all the reviews and they posted pics with the lights on and I thought this was great! I assumed the one I ordered was the same one. I was disappointed when we opened it up. Still a nice table but I thought I was paying a little more for the lights. My fault for not reading it correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for customizing
customer_reviews.text: Helped my daughter customize this for her boyfriend. Lightweight and has carrying handle. Removed decals, sanded surface, primed and she did custom paint job and modgepodge.
customer_reviews.author: rjg1620

customer_reviews.title: And it’s cool as hell
customer_reviews.text: Just got the table. And it’s cool as hell. Have not used it yet but what’s not to like. Lights are bright and multicolored didn’t even know it came with beer pong balls (6) and 4 colored markers. The dry erase is cool let’s u talk smack team names etc. great table. Let the beer pong commence And obviously it’s folds up small for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Petrokiewicz

customer_reviews.title: For the price. Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Led lighting and settings are very cool and useful. Table has nice graphics and is well put together. But table is a bit more flimsy then I would like. Both the top and the legs. I'd still recommend this product for the price though. One of the top tables on the market for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my brother. He absolutley loved it. I was really scared to purchase something like this without seeing it first, and I am glad I went ahead and bought it. It is crafted really well. The table is really sturdy and the lights are awesome! I would definitely recommend this table to anyone looking for a decent folding pong table!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa B

customer_reviews.title: The Best Investment I've EVER made
customer_reviews.text: This table is so sturdy and has made me tons of friends in college. My room is OFFICIALLY the party room of my floor. The lights have a few different settings and require 4 AA Batteries but look super sick!! This table collapses down to such a great size that even in my dorm room I can store it with ease. The product was shipped quickly and packaged very well! I would recommend this table to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa A Martinez

customer_reviews.title: 2nd PB table!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second table from PartyPongTables.com. The first one was a custom design. They do a great job and fast delivery. This table came in faster than expected. Great design, easy to store, and a standard size, 8ft beer pong table. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Jacobo

customer_reviews.title: Great Table Especially for BP Tournaments
customer_reviews.text: The beer pong table is awesome! The dry-erase feature makes it convenient to create a tournament bracket and decorate with different team logos. I contacted the seller to see if they could do they're best to make sure I received the table on the earlier side of the expected delivery date range. They were prompt with they're response and followed through with getting the table shipped quickly. All -around great experience!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Table
customer_reviews.text: This is a great table that folds down quickly, and is easily transportable. I’m not sure it’s durable enough to endure a frat house party, but it works perfectly for a bunch of middle aged dudes in the garage.
customer_reviews.author: R. Devlin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect 21st Birthday Gift!
customer_reviews.text: What else would a college student want for his 21st birthday? This product was shipped promptly and my son was thrilled to receive it as the perfect21st birthday gift. This table is sturdy and very well made. The cups are held securely in place by the cup holes. It's been tested and APPROVED by students at Western Michigan University. You will not be dissapointed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MichiganMom

customer_reviews.title: COULDN'T BE BETTER!!!
customer_reviews.text: First off, we received this beer pong table SO quickly, so that was great! Secondly, this table could not be more perfect! We purchased this to take with us to Vegas to play in the suite in August, we got it so early so we have played on the weekends & its SO much fun. We purchased the table with the LED lights, there is 3 different settings (solid lights, slow flashing, & fast flashing). It is the perfect way to entertain easily!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Material is so so
customer_reviews.text: Table itself is nice but not blown away by any means. My problem is the material doesn't allow the pong balls to bounce very well.
customer_reviews.author: A Riggle

customer_reviews.title: Great Beer Pong Table w/ Easy Setup
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Shipped quickly, and was packed very well. Very easy to setup, and breakdown. Requires 4 AA batteries for the lights (not included) if you purchased that particular feature. I stand at 6'3" and the table is at waste height. In the picture provided I used standard red Solo cups to give an idea of how high the cups sit. The cup wells are deep enough to keep the cups supported, and prevent any spillage from the cups tipping over. Make sure to heed the warnings provided in the instructions as this table was not built to support body weight. I would definitely recommend this to anyone looking for a quality beer pong table.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great table to buy
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a beer pong table for awhile now. I got this one for my birthday. It’s a great table and writing on it is awesome!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristopher J. Phenix

customer_reviews.title: The only good thing about it is that the size is great
customer_reviews.text: The table I received was damaged, and is not worth the price that I paid. The only good thing about it is that the size is great! Other than that, not worth the money. I would not recommend this purchase to others.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Really nice beer pong table
customer_reviews.text: Very nice table! I received the it very quickly, and it was packaged nicely. The table itself is easy to set up and break down, but it did come with directions for set up and breakdown incase you need it. There are handles on the side of the table for easy carrying. Cups fit nicely into the slots so they don't fall over during the game. The table has two battery packs that are located on the bottom of the table for the lights along the boarder of it. You just have to add 4 AA batteries (2 per pack). All in all its a good table!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good table! Very satisfied with purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the product. No longer will any of my friends worry about not having a table to play beer pong on. Everyone enjoyed being able to write whatever they want on it as well~ Arrived a lot sooner than I expected!
customer_reviews.author: Hank

customer_reviews.title: If you simply want to have a BP table and nothing else, here is your answer.
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. Whiteboard option is a must. Didn't get the lights, didn't see the point. Table, like others was kinda warped. Surface therefore wasn't flat. But it was okay, until it warped some more after 3rd use. It's harder to put away now. Pretty delicate product, for the price I expected more quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Big, Easy to transport and nice design
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this table for the price is great! We like that it is easy to transport because it folds into a case. Also the design on it is pretty cool and easy to clean. The size of the table is perfect. Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: DON'T LOOK ANY FURTHER FOR A BEER PONG TABLE!
customer_reviews.text: BEST BEER PONG TABLE EVER! I bought this table for my boyfriend as a 2 year anniversary present and he absolutely loves it! The holes are really ideal for someone like me in an apartment with carpet or just anyone that wants to avoid a lot of clean up after a game. The lights are AWESOME and have three super cool settings that really add to the experience especially if you want to play outside. It's sturdy yet light and easy to travel with! I researched these tables extensively and this is the absolute best table with the best add-ons especially at such an affordable price! And it arrived within 4 days of ordering it with free shipping!!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis La Benz

customer_reviews.title: I was hoping it'd stand a little taller but we still love it.
customer_reviews.text: Big hit for get togethers. I was hoping it'd stand a little taller but we still love it.
customer_reviews.author: ChNel

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: After less than 12 hours of table being delivered and 2 games played table is warping on back edge where cups sit. Also I tried to contact seller a few minutes after ordering table to see if possible to switch order to the table with cups in place and never got a response. The lights on the side make the table look very cheap and are peeling off already... 12 hours after delivery mind you. Trying to figure out how to upload the pictures now
customer_reviews.author: RynoBeast

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: This is is amazing! Someone the lights were disconnected I imagine during the shipping process, but it was an easy fix.
customer_reviews.author: Jinmen

customer_reviews.title: I love this table!
customer_reviews.text: I've made my friends and family jealous and they want their own now. It came with 6 pong balls as advertised and it's easy to set up and take down. I thought it would have been taller, actual height is 27 1/2", but it's actually a perfect height once you start playing.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie N

customer_reviews.title: Though the table has provided hours of fun, the construction is not very sturdy and I ...
customer_reviews.text: Though the table has provided hours of fun, the construction is not very sturdy and I don't anticipate it will last long. The lights have stopped working a few times - and then mysteriously start working again. The idea is great but the quality is just ok. Also the glow in the dark cups I ordered do not fit properly.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a gift for my son for his 25th birthday. It was the HIT of the party! The grandchildren even got their 84 yr old grandma to play! The speaker plays perfect not to low and not to high! I live the lights when they are sent on high speed rotation.! It was totally worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. Took part in two family Christmas parties and a New Year's eve party.
customer_reviews.author: deadguy85

customer_reviews.title: Love this beer pong table
customer_reviews.text: I got this beer pong table for my boyfriend. He was so surprised when it was delivered. Then he opened the box. The look on his face, priceless. He loves playing beer pong. This is a perfect table, with cup holes. No spilled beer all over. We love this beer pong table and hopefully will years from now.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Bradley

product_meta.title: PartyPongTables.com 8-Foot Beer Pong Table w/Optional Cup Holes, LED Lights, Dry Erase Surface & More - Choose Your Table Model
product_meta.description: PartyPongTables.com Professional Beer Pong Tables are for everyone looking for an affordable, portable beer pong table. Anodized aluminum framing and legs make these tables the most durable beer pong tables on the market, capable of withstanding extreme temperatures, liquids and physical abuse. The Professional beer pong table conveniently folds into a 2 ft. x 2 ft. case making it portable and convenient to bring to any party, tailgate or event. *OPTIONAL Cup Holes for the game cups prevent cups from sliding and spilling over. *OPTIONAL Color-Changing LED Glow Lights add an awesome lighting effect to your Party Pong Table. Easily visible in daylight and extra vibrant in the dark, these battery-powered LED glow light strips put the 'Party' in Party Pong beer pong tables.
feature_bullets: 8 Foot Beer Pong Table w/ Cup Holes & Dry Erase Surface. (4) Dry Erase Pens Included.

Party Pong Tables are the HIGHEST-REVIEWED & best-selling beer pong tables online! Party Pong has been manufacturing and selling beer pong tables since 2006. Party Pong legitimately cares about the quality of the product and the satisfaction of our customers.
Dry Erase surface is super easy to wipe clean. Table easily folds into carrying case w/ latch & handles.
Attached Pong Ball Holder w/ (6) Party Pong Balls
